Name: Botanik
About the game: Botanik is a small relaxing game about a geometric-shaped gardener that takes care of various plants. Note: a working internet connection is required to play this game. Features At least 10 minutes of playtime (and way more if you enjoy watering your plants). Take care of your own plants. Relax in your own glasshouse. Visit the gardens of other players. Cute characters and animations. Unlock new seeds by taking good care of your plants. Controls Left mouse button to move camera & interact. Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
